eduversum.name: Kexi
eduversum.description: Kexi is a free and open Data-bank-Manager and is developed as an alternative to MS-Access. Kexi can be used to generate Data-bank schema, to edit, add, query and manage the data of a data-bank. Forms could be create with Kexi, to get a tailor-made user environment for the data management. All data-bank objects like tables, queries and forms are held in a relational data-bank. Data can be taken from a MySQL or PostgreSQL data-bank so it can be used with Kexi and Kexi-Data-bank files can be exported into a MySQL or PostgreSQL server. Moreover Kexi can take over MS-Access-Data-bank-Tables. Macros and the programing languages Python and Ruby are supported (still in development).
